title: Add Biometric Login
description: Enhance the auth system with biometric authentication (fingerprint/face) for returning users.
instructions:
Add biometric login capability that allows users who have previously logged in to authenticate using their device's biometric sensor.

1. Add the local_auth package dependency
2. Check if biometrics are available on the device
3. Store a flag when user enables biometric login
4. Show biometric prompt on app launch if enabled
5. Fall back to password login if biometric fails

The implementation should:
- Check device capability before showing the option
- Securely store the biometric preference
- Handle all biometric authentication results
- Work seamlessly with the existing auth flow

hints.text: Use the local_auth package which provides cross-platform biometric authentication.
Biometric should only be offered after a user has successfully logged in once - store their session tokens securely.
Handle all edge cases: device not supported, biometrics not enrolled, user cancelled, too many failed attempts.
